title: Photography Credits
publication_title: Whistler Paintings and Drawings at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body"> Photography Credits  
Unless otherwise noted, all overall high-resolution color, UV, IR, and transmitted-IR photographs of the works in the catalogue are by Robert Lifson, Craig Stillwell, and Joe Tallarico, with postproduction by Jonathan Mathias and Owen Conway and preproduction by Elyse Allen and Aidan Fitzgerald, coordinated by P. D. Young, Imaging, the Art Institute of Chicago, and are copyrighted by the Art Institute of Chicago.

Additional technical and scientific images of the works in the catalogue were produced by conservators in Conservation and Science at the Art Institute of Chicago, and copyrighted by the Art Institute of Chicago. Kimberley Muir captured additional infrared, raking-light, and cross-section images. Technical images were composited and registered for the interactive image overlay tool by Kelly Keegan. Technical images of works of art on paper were captured by María Cristina Rivera Ramos.

Figs. 10, 13: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art. Image source: Art Resource, NY.

Figs. 11, 12: © The Hunterian, University of Glasgow.
